text: William A. "Billy" Cundiff (born March 30, 1980) is an American former professional football placekicker. He played parts of 13 years in the National Football League (NFL). He played for the Dallas Cowboys, New Orleans Saints, Cleveland Browns, Baltimore Ravens, Washington Redskins, San Francisco 49ers, and Buffalo Bills. Cundiff played college football at Drake University and was also part of the Drake Bulldog's Men's Basketball team. ==References== ==Other websites== *Billy Cundiff at baltimoreravens.com Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Baltimore Ravens players Category:Buffalo Bills players Category:Dallas Cowboys players Category:Cleveland Browns players Category:New Orleans Saints players Category:San Francisco 49ers players Category:Washington Redskins players Category:American football placekickers Category:Sportspeople from Phoenix, Arizona
title: Billy Cundiff
